meanings.definition: Existing or occurring between different communities.
meanings.sent1: The intercommunal event brought together people from various neighborhoods.
meanings.sent2: The intercommunal picnic was attended by residents from different towns.
meanings.sent3: The intercommunal potluck showcased dishes from diverse areas.
meanings.sent4: The intercommunal harmony concert united singers from all over the city.
meanings.sent5: The intercommunal art exhibition displayed works representing various communities.

meanings.definition: Involving or shared by multiple communities.
meanings.sent1: The intercommunal project received contributions from many neighborhoods.
meanings.sent2: The intercommunal celebration included traditions from various cultures.
meanings.sent3: The intercommunal soccer match had players from different parts of the city.
meanings.sent4: The intercommunal garden flourished with plants from diverse areas.
meanings.sent5: The intercommunal festival featured performances by groups from multiple communities.
